arguments.argument:
str[0] = "Alright, alright, I know the level design for these bonus levels is really lazy. What, did you expect something SPECIAL or something? These levels are just extraneous." str[1] = "I have a life, you know, and better things to do than make bonus levels for people like YOU! Really, you should be making bonus levels for ME. Now take your [Gold Gem] and stop your whining. You should be glad I'm finishing this stupid game at all." str[2] = "There. Aren't you happy you were actually skilled enough to be able to hear me vent my exclusive rage?!*"
img[0] = Sign img[1] = Sign img[2] = Sign
name[0] = "Sign" name[1] = "Sign" name[2] = "Sign"
event_inherited();
